department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Population Genetics
course.faculty_text: Daniel L. Hartl (Public Health) and Michael Manish Desai
course.description: Mathematical theory, experimental data, and history of ideas in the field, including analytical methods to study genetic variation with applications to evolution, demographic history, agriculture, health and disease. Includes lectures, problem sets, and student presentations.
course.prerequisites: LS1b or permission of the instructor.
